about_the_game:
H3X@G0N@L, terraforming worlds. Your way.

H3X is a Hexagonal based city builder developed by manoversa studios. Make your way through the randomly generated worlds and pillage the planet of all it offers. Mine your way up to be a planet-wide civilization. Take hold of different resources such as colorful foliage, craggy rocks, and oil wells to speed up the production of other factories. Don't have enough resources? Well, hope you like carpel tunnel because you will be clicking for days!

H3X is still in a significant development phase, so features, art styles, and codebases may change at any time. There are features missing that will be added in future builds, and more. If any element of H3X is broken you may refund at any time, or submit a bug report to us to help out with development!
